mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (start, end, title, color, group_id, course_id) VALUES(#{start}, #{end}, #{title}, #{color}, #{group_id}, #{course_id})
mapper.select: SELECT id, start, end, title, color, group_id, course_id FROM schedule WHERE course_id = #{course_id} AND group_id = 0
SELECT id, start, end, title, color, group_id, course_id FROM schedule WHERE course_id = #{course_id} AND group_id IN (0, #{group_id})
